overview_of_class: This graduate seminar surveys traditional and current scholarship on the American presidency. We will examine major theories of executive power and leadership, unilateral action, and institutional change; and we will consider the dynamic relationship between the presidency and the Congress, the bureaucracy, the parties, and the public. Special attention is given to contemporary research on these topics.
name: The Presidency
title: WCAS POLI_SCI 414-0-20 The Presidency
